version_description:
ver.3.1.3 Update
New Event: Record Buster has been added.
■Update
・New Event: Record Buster has been implemented.
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
■Resolved Issues& Improvements
・The Issue; the HP Bar of Demi Spirit which players encounter in Ais Episode 19-4 and Lefiya Episode 19-7, not displaying properly has been solved.
・Other minor issues resolved.

ver.3.1.3 Update
New Event: Record Buster has been added.
■Update
・New Event: Record Buster has been implemented.
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
■Resolved Issues& Improvements
・The Issue; the HP Bar of Demi Spirit which players encounter in Ais Episode 19-4 and Lefiya Episode 19-7, not displaying properly has been solved.
・Other minor issues resolved.

v3.1.4 update

We have resolved the issue of Hero Charm.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

v3.1.4 update

We have resolved the issue of Hero Charm.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the issue.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

version 3.2.0 update
4/25(Wed) ver.3.2.0 Update will include additional data below.

■Updates
・New Characters and New Event data have been added.

■Resolved Issues & Improvements
・"P.Resist" has been added to Enemy Status Screen.
・You can now receive Mission Rewards all at once.
・You can now form 3 parties in Wargame and Record Buster.
・You can view details of each item by long-pressing Item Icon.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

version 3.2.0 update
4/25(Wed) ver.3.2.0 Update will include additional data below.

■Updates
・New Characters and New Event data have been added.

■Resolved Issues & Improvements
・"P.Resist" has been added to Enemy Status Screen.
・You can now receive Mission Rewards all at once.
・You can now form 3 parties in Wargame and Record Buster.
・You can view details of each item by long-pressing Item Icon.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

【Ver.3.2.3 Update Details】
Lottery Event has been implemented.

■Updates
・New Character & New Event Data have been added.
■New Feature & Resolved Issues, Improvements
・Lottery Event has been implemented.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

【Ver.3.2.3 Update Details】
Lottery Event has been implemented.

■Updates
・New Character & New Event Data have been added.
■New Feature & Resolved Issues, Improvements
・Lottery Event has been implemented.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.
version 3.3.0 update
version 3.3.0 update

version 3.3.1 update

■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・Issue with the Combat Skill "Enrage" for 4star[Brave Swordsman] Finn in the Ultimate War Game has been resolved.
・Issue with the Mission Icon has been resolved.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

version 3.3.1 update

■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・Issue with the Combat Skill "Enrage" for 4star[Brave Swordsman] Finn in the Ultimate War Game has been resolved.
・Issue with the Mission Icon has been resolved.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

■Update
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.

■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・A new title screen has been added.
・A new story [Episode Ryu] has been added.
・A new function to replay uncleared quests from the past has been added to the Story Digest.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

■Updates
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements

・A new title screen has been added.
・Casino feature has been added.

v4.1.0 Update
■Updates
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・Visual adjustment has been made for iPhoneX.
・A new title screen has been added.
・Casino feature has been added.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

version 4.2.0 update
■Updates
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
・Gnome Ticket Exchange has been added.
・Amid has been added to Interact.
■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・EXTRA Quests have been added to Falna, Exilia and Valis Quests.
・Rental feature has been added to a new event.
・An issue with a double amount of Casino Medals received incorrectly if a player reached a limit of winning the Double Up, or earned the maximum prize by playing Poker in Casino, has been fixed.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

version 4.2.0 update
■Updates
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
・Gnome Ticket Exchange has been added.
・Amid has been added to Interact.
■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・EXTRA Quests have been added to Falna, Exilia and Valis Quests.
・Rental feature has been added to a new event.
・An issue with a double amount of Casino Medals received incorrectly if a player reached a limit of winning the Double Up, or earned the maximum prize by playing Poker in Casino, has been fixed.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

version 4.3.0 update
■Updates
・New Characters & New Event Data have been added.
■Added Function, Resolved Issues & Improvements
・[Upgrade], [Rehammer] and [Smelting] have been added to Blacksmith.
・Dispatch Quest has been added.
・Crafting Quest has been added.
・Improvements made to Units sorting and filtering systems, [Sort by] and [Filter]: Skill Element and Method Obtained have been added.
・A change to include at least one card that can be used to win the Double Up challenge at the Casino has been made.
・A change to record Casino Medals that have been betted at the Casino has been made.
・Other minor issues and display performance have been resolved and adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of "Dan-Machi MEMORIA FREESE".

■Updates
　・New Units along with a new Event has been added.
■Added Functions, Resolved Issues, & Improvements
　・Improved Blacksmith (""Rehammer"", ""Upgrade"", and ""Smelting"") Functions.
　・Added effects to ""Rehammer"" when you get a Great Success.
　・Amount of ownable equipment (Weapons & Armor) has been expanded from 200 to 300.
　・Minor issues have been adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continuous support of ""DanMachi MEMORIA FREESE".

Please make sure you have read the notes below before updating to ver.5.2.0.
・Please secure enough storage space on your device to update from the App Store, it will become necessary to temporarily store data in your device, so you will need an estimated storage space that is (approximately) 2.5GB larger than the current application size.
※Temporary data will be saved in your device.
・The temporary saved data will be automatically deleted after the application update.
・File size after the deletion of the temporary data will be approximately 500MB larger than the current application size. Please be aware of the internet data usage.
・It may take awhile to start the application for the first time after the update.

■Updates
・New Event Data have been added.
■Added Functions, Resolved Issues, & Improvements
・Function to change Equipment all at once.
・Other minor issues and display issues have been adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continued support of "DanMachi MEMORIA FREESE".

■Updates
・New Units and a new Event are added.

■Added Functions, Resolved Issues, & Improvements
・Feature to sell multiple bonds at once is implemented.
・Familia Chat added.
・Long pressing + or - button counts as constant entries.
・Feature to skip Dispatch Quest animations is added.
・Other minor issues and display issues are fixed.

We will continue to add and improve functions and fix any issues.
Thank you for your continued support of ""DanMachi MEMORIA FREESE"".

・New Units and a new Event have been added.
・A level limitation for the Familia Level has been increased.
■Added Functions, Resolved Issues, & Improvements
・New event feature has been implemented.
・A new resolution setting has been added.
・Each profiles can now be viewed from the member list in the Familia.
・Other minor issues and display issues have been adjusted.

We will continue to add and improve functions and resolve any issues.
Thank you for your continued support of "DanMachi MEMORIA FREESE".
